Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's been so long since the last record.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Everybody has stopped going to class. Mommy and Daddy are also staying at home.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's got something to do with a strange virus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's a virus that infects people... and also electronics.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The infected people all die very quickly... and the infected electronics all... begin attacking humans, it's very strange.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, right. The system matched Nanami with someone... That someone's a girl.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Through projection chatting, we talked a lot about... stuff. She likes a lot of things similar to Nanami, that's the good ol' Gestalt at work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "She doesn't have black hair, but she has blue eyes. Just like Mommy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's sad that the Gestalt system's matching function is going to be shut down... all because of the virus... But at least, Jane and I exchanged contacts!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Jane said she would come meet me after some time, and we can finally see each other.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "When the time comes... What should Nanami wear...? Hmmm, it's a brain teaser.", 4: '1'}
